title: The Finder Outer
description: Some cops can read minds, some cops can see the past, and some cops get help from angels. There’s still one cop with no special abilities whatsoever. Detective Klaus Mandela is The Finder Outer.
quote: There’s only one way to know who commited this crime. I’ll just have to… find out.
altHero: Detective Klaus Mandela on the street firing his gun
alt2: Klaus kneels next to a murder victim with a knife stuck in him
alt3: Klaus in line at a hot dog cart and questions an angel who wants nothing to do with him
alt4: Klaus thinks in front of an evidence bulletin board
